432:1: māraśca bhikṣavaḥ pāpīyān bodhisattvasya ṣaḍvarṣāṇi duṣkaracaryāṃ carataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddho'bhūt avatāraprekṣī avatāragaveṣī|
432:11: jīvato jīvitaṃ śreyo jīvan dharmaṃ cariṣyasi|
432:12: jīvaṃ hi tāni kurute yāni kṛtvā na śocati||4||
432:13: kṛśo vivarṇo dīnastvaṃ antike maraṇaṃ tava|
432:15: dadataḥ satataṃ dānaṃ agnihotraṃ ca juhvataḥ|
432:21: aṇumātraṃ hi me puṇyairartho māra na vidyate|
432:22: artho yeṣāṃ tu puṇyena tānevaṃ vaktumarhasi||9||
432:23: naivāhaṃ maraṇaṃ manye maraṇāntaṃ hi jīvitam|
432:27: śoṇite tu viśuṣke vai tato māṃsaṃ viśuṣyati|
432:31: cittaṃ nāvekṣate kāyaṃ paśya sattvasya śuddhatām||13||
432:32: asti chandaṃ tathā vīryaṃ prajñāpi mama vidyate|
432:33: taṃ na paśyāmyahaṃ loke vīryādyo māṃ vicālayet||14||
432:36: nāśūro jayate senāṃ jitvā caināṃ na manyate|
432:37: śūrastu jayate senāṃ laghu māra jayāmi te||16||
432:39: tṛtīyā kṣutpipāsā te tṛṣṇā senā caturthikā||17||
432:40: pañcamī styānamiddhaṃ te bhayaṃ ṣaṣṭī nirucyate |
432:42: lobhaślokau ca saṃskārau mithyālabdhaṃ ca yadyaśaḥ|
432:44: eṣā hi namuceḥ senā kṛṣṇabandhoḥ pratāpinaḥ|
432:46: yā te senā dharṣayati lokamenaṃ sadevakam|
432:48: smṛtiṃ sūpasthitāṃ kṛtvā prajñāṃ caiva subhāvitām|
432:50: evamukte māraḥ pāpīyān duḥkhī durmanā anāttamanā vipratisārī tatraivāntaradhāt||
432:51: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvasyaitadabhūt-ye kecicchramaṇā brāhmaṇā vā atītānāgatapratyutpanneṣvadhvasvātmopakramikāṃ śarīropatāpikāṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukāmamanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayanti etāvatparamaṃ te duḥkhamanubhavanti||
432:52: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt-anayāpi khalu mayā caryayā anayāpi pratipadā na kaściduttarimanuṣyadharmādalamāryajñānadarśanaviśeṣaḥ sākṣātkṛtaḥ|
432:56: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhavat-yadahaṃ piturudyāne jambucchāyāyāṃ niṣaṇṇo viviktaṃ kāmairviviktaṃ pāpakairakuśalairdharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya vyāhārṣaṃ yāvaccaturthadhyānamupasaṃpadya vyāhārṣam,
432:60: tasya mamaitadabhūt-nāsau mārgaḥ śakyaḥ evaṃ daurbalyaprāptenābhisaṃboddhum|
432:62: na me paścimā janatā anukampitā syāt|
432:65: tatra bhikṣavo ye te lūhādhimuktā devaputrāste mama cetasaścetasaiva parivitarkamājñāya yenāhaṃ tenopasaṃkramya māmevamāhuḥ-mā sma tvaṃ satpuruṣa audārikamāhāramāhareḥ|
432:67: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt-ahaṃ khalvanaśana ityātmānaṃ pratijāne,
432:68: sāmantāśca me gocaragrāmavāsino janā evaṃ saṃjānante sma yathānaśanaḥ śramaṇo gautamaḥ|
432:69: itīva me khalu lūhādhimuktā devaputrā romakūpairojaḥ prakṣipanti|
432:71: tato bodhisattvo mṛṣāvādaparihārārthaṃ tān devaputrān pratikṣipyaudārikamāhāramāhartu cittaṃ nāmayati sma||
432:72: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ṣaḍvarṣavratatapaḥsamuttīrṇo bodhisattvo'smādāsanādutthāyaudārikamāhāramāhariṣyāmīti vācaṃ niścārayati sma|
432:74: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ pañcānāṃ bhadravargīyānāmetadabhūt-tayāpi tāvaccaryayā tayāpi tāvatpratipadā śramaṇena gautamena na śakitaṃ kiṃciduttarimanuṣyadharmādalamāryajñānadarśanaviśeṣaṃ sākṣātkartum,
432:77: te vārāṇasīṃ gatvā ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve vyāhārṣuḥ||
432:78: tatra bodhisattvamādita eva duṣkaracaryāṃ carantaṃ daśa grāmikaduhitaraḥ kumārya upagacchan darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya ca|
432:81: balā ca nāma dārikā balaguptā ca supriyā ca vijayasenā ca atimuktakamalā ca sundarī ca kumbhakārī ca uluvillikā ca jaṭilikā ca sujātā ca nāma grāmikaduhitāḥ|
432:82: ābhiḥ kumārikābhirbodhisattvāya sarvāstā yūṣavidhāḥ kṛtvopanāmitā abhūvan|
432:83: tāścābhyavahṛtya bodhisattvaḥ krameṇa gocaragrāme piṇḍāya caran varṇarūpabalavānabhūt|
432:84: tadagreṇa bodhisattvaḥ sundaraḥ śramaṇo mahāśramaṇa ityācakṣate||
432:85: tatra ca bhikṣavaḥ sujātā grāmikaduhitā bodhisattvasya duṣkaracaryāṃ carataḥ ādita eva bodhisattvasya vratatapaḥsamuttāraṇārthaṃ śarīrasyāpyāyanahetośca pratidivasamaṣṭaśataṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ bhojayati sma|
432:86: evaṃ ca praṇidadhāti sma-mama bhojanaṃ bhuktvā bodhisattvo'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeteti||
432:87: tasya me bhikṣavaḥ ṣaḍvarṣavyativṛttasya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi parijīrṇānyabhūvan|
432:88: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt-sacedahaṃ kaupīnapracchādanaṃ labheyam,
432:90: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena sujātāyā grāmikaduhiturdāsī rādhā nāma kālagatābhūt|
432:93: tato'haṃ tatpāṃśukūlaṃ vāmena pādenākramya dakṣiṇaṃ hastaṃ prasāryāvanato'bhūttadrahītum|
432:94: atha bhaumā devā antarīkṣāṇāṃ devānāṃ ghoṣamanuśrāvayanti sma-āścaryaṃ mārṣā adbhutamidaṃ mārṣāḥ|
432:95: yatra hi nāmaivaṃ mahārājakulaprasūtasya cakravartirājyaparityāginaḥ pāṃśukūle cittaṃ natamiti|
432:96: antarīkṣā devā bhaumānāṃ devānāṃ śabdaṃ śratvā cāturmahārājikānāṃ devānāṃ ghoṣamudīrayanti sma|
432:103: iti hi bhikṣavastatkṣaṇaṃ tallavaṃ tanmuhūrtaṃ yāvadakaniṣṭhabhuvanādekaghoṣa ekasaṃnirnādo'bhyudgato'bhūt āścaryamidaṃ mārṣā adbhutamidam|
432:104: yatra hi nāmaivaṃ mahārājakulaprasūtasya cakravartirājyaparityāginaḥ pāṃśukūle cittaṃ natamiti||
432:108: tatastatraiva devatā pāṇinā mahīṃ parāhanti sma|
432:117: atha śakro devarājo bodhisattvamevamāha-dadasvedaṃ satpuruṣa mahyam|
432:119: tato bodhisattvaḥ svayaṃkāritāṃ pravrajyāyāḥ saṃdarśayituṃ tatpāṃśukūlaṃ śakrasyādatvā svayameva prakṣālayati sma|
432:121: māreṇa ca pāpīyasā īrṣyādharmaparītena puṣkariṇyā atyucchritāni taṭāni nirmitānyabhūvan|
432:123: tatra devatāṃ bodhisattvo lokānuvṛttyā devatānugrahārthaṃ cābravīt-āhara devate vṛkṣaśākhāmiti|
432:126: uttīrya ca tasya kakubhapādapasyādhastāttatpāṃśukūlaṃ saṃghāṭīkṛtya āsīvyati sma|
432:127: adyāpi tat pāṃśukūlaṃ sīvanamityevaṃ saṃjñāyate sma||
432:129: sa divyāni cīvarāṇi kāṣāyaraṅgaraktāni kalpikāni śramaṇasārūpyāṇi bodhisattvāyopanāmayati sma|
432:130: bodhisattvaśca tāni gṛhītvā pūrvāhṇe nivāsya saṃghāṭīprāvṛtya gocaragrāmābhimukho'bhut||
432:131: tatra devatābhirurubilvāsenāpatigrāmake nandikagrāmikaduhituḥ sujātāyā ārocitamabhūdardharātrasamaye-yadarthaṃ tvaṃ mahāyajñaṃ yajase tasmādvratāduttīrṇaḥ saḥ|
432:133: tvayā ca pūrve praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam-mama bhojanaṃ bhuktvā bodhisattvo'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeta iti|
432:135: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sujātā nandikagrāmaduhitā teṣāṃ devatānāṃ tadvacanaṃ śrutvā śīghraṃ gosahasrasya kṣīrātsaptakṛtsāroddhṛtādagryamojomaṇḍaṃ gṛhṇīte sma|
432:137: bhinavaistaṇḍulairabhinavāyāṃ sthālyāmabhinavāṃ cullīmupalipya tadbhojanaṃ sādhayati sma|
432:138: tasmiṃśca sādhyamāne imāni pūrvanimittāni saṃdṛśyante sma-tasmin khalvapi kṣīre śrīvatsasvastikanandyāvartapadmavardhamānādīni maṅgalyāni saṃdṛśyante sma|
432:140: niḥsaṃśayamidaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuktvā bodhisattvo'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prāpsyati|
432:143: tataḥ sujātā taṃ pāyasaṃ pakvaṃ sthaṇḍilamupalipya puṣpairavakīrya gandhodakenābhyukṣya āsanaṃ prajñāpya satkṛtyottarāṃ nāma ceṭīmāmantrayate sma-gacchottare brāhmaṇamānaya|
432:145: sādhvārya iti pratiśrutya uttarā pūrvāṃ diśamagamat|
432:151: tena khalu punaḥ samayena śuddhāvāsakāyikairdevaputraiḥ sarve'nyatīrthikā nigṛhītā abhūvan|
432:153: tataḥ sā āgatvā svāminīmevamāha-na khalvārye anyaḥ kaścid dṛśyate śramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā,
432:160: sādhvārye ityuttarā gatvā bodhisattvasya caraṇayoḥ praṇipatya sujātāyā nāmnopanimantrayate sma|
432:161: tato bhikṣavo bodhisattvaḥ sujātāyā grāmikaduhiturniveśanaṃ gatvā prajñapta evāsane nyaṣīdat|
432:162: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sujātā grāmikaduhitā suvarṇamayīṃ pātrīṃ madhupāyasapūrṇāṃ bodhisattvasyopanāmayati sma||
432:165: atha bodhisattvastadbhojanaṃ pratigṛhya sujātāṃ grāmikaduhitarametadavocat-iyaṃ bhagini suvarṇapātrī|
432:171: atha bodhisattvastaṃ piṇḍapātramādāyorubilvāyā niṣkramya nāganadīṃ pūrvāhṇakālasamaye nadīṃ nairañjanāmupasaṃkramya taṃ piṇḍapātraṃ cīvarāṇi caikānte nikṣipya nadīṃ nairañjanāmavatarati sma gātrāṇi śītalīkartum||
432:172: bodhisattvasya khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ snāyato'nekāni devaputraśatasahasrāṇi divyāgurucandanacūrṇavilepanairnadīmāloḍayanti sma|
432:173: divyāni ca nānāvarṇāni kusumāni jale kṣipanti sma yaduta bodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe||
432:174: tena khalu punaḥ samayena nairañjanā nadī divyairgandhaiḥ puṣpaiśca samākulā vahati sma|
432:176: taṃ devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇyabhyutkṣipya svakasvakāni bhavanāni nayanti sma caityārthaṃ pūjārthaṃ ca||
432:178: tāni sarvāṇi sujātā grāmikaduhitā maṅgalyānīti kṛtvā caityārthaṃ pūjārthaṃ ca parigṛhṇīte sma||
432:179: nadyuttīrṇaśca bodhisattvaḥ pulinaṃ nirīkṣate sma upaveṣṭukāmaḥ|
432:180: atha yā nairañjanāyāṃ nadyāṃ nāgakanyā sā dharaṇitalādabhyudgabhya maṇimayaṃ (manoramaṃ)
432:182: tatra bodhisattvo niṣadya yāvadarthaṃ taṃ madhupāyasaṃ paribhuṅkte sma sujātāyā grāmikaduhituranukampāmupādāya|
432:183: paribhujya ca tāṃ suvarṇapātrīmanapekṣo vāriṇi prākṣipati sma|
432:184: kṣiptamātrāṃ ca tāṃ sāgaro nāgarājaścittikārabahumānajāto gṛhītvā svabhavanābhimukhaḥ prasthito'bhut pūjārheti kṛtvā|
432:185: atha daśaśatanayanaḥ puraṃdaro garuḍarūpamabhinirmāya vajratuṇḍo bhūtvā sāgarasya nāgarājasyāntikāttāṃ suvarṇapātrīṃ hartumārabdhaḥ|
432:187: tadā svarūpeṇādareṇa yācitvā trāyatriṃśadbhavanaṃ nītavān pūjārthaṃ caityārthaṃ ca|
432:189: adyāpi ca trāyatriṃśeṣu deveṣu pratisaṃvatsaraṃ pātrīmaho vartate|
432:190: tacca bhadrāsanaṃ tayaiva nāgakanyayā parigṛhītaṃ caityārthaṃ pūjārthaṃ ca||
432:192: atha tatkṣaṇameva bodhisattvasya puṇyabalena prajñābalena pūrvikā kāye śubhavarṇapuṣkaratā prādurabhūt|
432:195: ṣaḍvarṣa vrata uttaritva bhagavān evaṃ matiṃ cintayan
432:198: no me syādanukampitā hi janatā evaṃ bhavet paścimā||23||
432:199: yattvaudārika bhuktva bhojanavaraṃ kāye balaṃ kṛtvanā
432:202: no śaktā siya budhyanāya amṛtaṃ kāyena te durbalāḥ||24||
432:203: sā ca grāmikadhīta pūrvacaritā nāmnā sujātā iti
432:204: yajñā nityu yajāti evamanasā siddhe vrataṃ nāyake|
432:205: sā devāna niśāmya codana tadā gṛhyā madhūpāyasaṃ
432:209: tīrṇastāraku pārasattva matimāṃ snāne matiṃ cintayan
432:210: oruhyā nadi snāpi śuddhavimalo lokānukampī muniḥ||26||
432:211: devā koṭisahasra hṛṣṭamanasā gandhāmbu cūrṇāni ca
432:212: oruhyā nadi loḍayanti salilaṃ snānārtha sattvottame|
432:213: snānā snātvana bodhisattva vimalastīre sthitaḥ sūrataḥ
432:215: kāṣāyāni ca vastra nirmala śubhā tā devaputro dade
432:216: kalpīyāni ca saṃnivāsya bhagavāṃstīre hi nadyāḥ sthitaḥ|
432:217: nāgākanya udagra hṛṣṭamanasā bhadrāsanaṃ sā nyaṣīt
432:219: dattvā bhojanu sā sujāta matimāṃ svarṇāmaye bhājane
432:220: vanditvā caraṇāni sā pramuditā paribhuṅkṣva me sārathe|
432:221: bhuktvā bhojanu yāvadartha matimān pātrīṃ jale prākṣipat
432:222: tāṃ jagrāha puraṃdaraḥ suraguruḥ pūjāṃ kariṣyāmyaham||29||
432:223: yada bhuktaṃ ca jinena bhojanavaraṃ odārikaṃ tatkṣaṇe
432:224: tasyā kāyabalaṃ ca tejaśiriyā pūrvaṃ yathā saṃsthitam|
432:225: dharmā kṛtva kathā sujāta maruṇāṃ kṛtvā ca arthaṃ bahuṃ
